thread.title: Steven Heilig of Baird & Warner Wins 2015 Five Star Real Estate Agent
thread.title_full: Steven Heilig of Baird & Warner Wins 2015 Five Star Real Estate Agent Award

author: Five Star Professional Representative
title: Steven Heilig of Baird & Warner Wins 2015 Five Star Real Estate Agent
text:
“I have had my real estate license since 1983, and have worked full-time in the business since then. Prior to that, I was president of a small home building company in the north and northwest suburbs, building custom and spec homes as well as small commercial buildings. Since 1983, my real estate resale business has grown to encompass the city of Chicago, from the South Loop, north to Rogers Park and the north and northwest Suburbs, allowing me to become ‘Your City and Suburban Expert’. Prior to building homes, I was in the hotel business. I felt that the technical knowledge of building a home coupled with the customer service of the hotel industry was a perfect blend of what I needed to serve my clients in the real estate industry. I was also a single Dad at that time and the nature of the business allowed me some scheduling flexibility to be a part of my son's life while he was growing up,” Steve Heilig says. Steve Heilig, Baird & Warner , is featured in a special section of the October issue of Chicago magazine as a 2015 Five Star Real Estate Agent award winner.
Five Star Professional partnered with Chicago magazine to identify and showcase an exclusive group of real estate agents who have demonstrated excellence in their field. Less than 7 percent of agents in the Chicago-area received this recognition.
The 2015 Five Star Real Estate Agent award winners have been carefully selected for their commitment to professional excellence and overall client satisfaction. The award is based on rigorous research with significant focus on customer feedback and providing quality services.
“Since this award is client generated, it is the best compliment I can receive. I would just like to thank everyone for your support and confidence in me,” Steve. says.
“Five Star Professional’s research is extensive, with more than 10 million consumers, peers and other stakeholders contacted each year. We are relentless in our efforts to identify those professionals with the utmost standard of excellence,” says Jonathan Wesser, Senior Research Manager, Five Star Professional.
Steve Heilig’s Five Star award profile can be viewed here .
About the research process:
Now entering its 13th year, Five Star Professional conducts in-depth, market-specific research in more than 45 markets across the United States and Canada to identify premium service professionals.
Five Star Professional contacts thousands of recent homebuyers to identify award candidates. Phone, mail and online respondents rate their real estate agent on 10 satisfaction criteria. Candidates with a qualifying client satisfaction rating move on to be evaluated on objective criteria such as experience, production levels and disciplinary and complaint history.
Real estate agents do not pay a fee to be considered or awarded. For more information, visit http://www.fivestarprofessional.com .
